job_tasks.phrase: developing production-grade Machine Learning systems, from models to features and pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building and deploying ML systems, encompassing models, features, and the surrounding pipelines, which aligns with integrating ML into production software.

job_tasks.phrase: own the design and delivery of ML systems, from initial idea generation and collecting business requirements from product stakeholders to implementation
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the end-to-end responsibility for software systems, including requirements gathering and implementation, which is a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely together with the other Machine Learning Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers in the Intent Discovery track as well as with Data Engineers, Software Engineers and Product Managers
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes collaboration within a software development context, working with various engineering and product roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining.
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the focus on building robust, production-ready software systems with considerations for operational aspects like reliability, scalability, and monitoring.

job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries. Choose the right technology or coding methodology and refactor and simplify code when necessary.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of core software engineering practices related to code quality, maintainability, and technical decision-making.

job_tasks.phrase: Take full ownership of services end-to-end by actively monitoring system health, performance, and business impact. Ensure the relevant service level objectives (SLOs) are met.
job_tasks.justification: This describes operational responsibilities for deployed services, including monitoring, performance, and meeting SLOs, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework, including leveraging published research, open-source technologies, and previously-developed products at Booking.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating and abstracting AI concepts into broader software frameworks, a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, as well as ML governance processes.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves managing data processing services and storage systems, which is a data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate possible architecture solutions considering business and technology requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating architecture solutions is a fundamental software engineering task that bridges business and technical needs.

job_tasks.phrase: leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models for more relevant recommendations.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions using GenAI to build fine-tuned models, which is a core task in model development.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely together with the other Machine Learning Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers in the Intent Discovery track as well as with Data Engineers, Software Engineers and Product Managers
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for close collaboration with various technical and product teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Take full ownership of services end-to-end
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a strong sense of responsibility and ownership for the services developed and maintained.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to the internal ML/AI community by sharing knowledge and participating in internal ML programs.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes knowledge sharing and participation within the broader ML/AI community.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling as needed.
soft_skills.justification: This shows a clear expectation for continuous learning and staying current with the rapidly evolving ML/AI field.

soft_skills.phrase: collecting business requirements from product stakeholders
soft_skills.justification: This task involves understanding and gathering business needs from stakeholders, which falls under business understanding.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a Machine Learning Engineer role that focuses on developing production-grade ML systems, including models, features, and pipelines. It explicitly mentions leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models for recommendations, indicating a specialization in Generative AI. The role also involves significant software engineering tasks such as building reusable code, monitoring services, evaluating architectures, and collaborating with various engineering teams. The balance of core software engineering (Macro-Category A) and specific GenAI model development (Macro-Category B) tasks, with a clear emphasis on GenAI, leads to the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning both traditional ML engineering tasks and the use of GenAI for model development. The responsibilities are well-defined, allowing for a confident classification of tasks and a clear assignment of the profile.
